meta.title: Deal and Pipeline Inspection | Aviso Flow
meta.description: Aviso flow's 360-degree pipeline and revenue dashboards unlock new insights into pipeline progression, pipeline health and where reps need to focus next.

content.subtitle: Aviso Flow
content.title: Get your biggest revenue questions answered with Pipeline Intelligence
content.description: Most sales teams struggle with partial visibility into pipeline development and target fulfillment. Aviso flow's 360-degree pipeline and revenue dashboards unlock new insights into pipeline progression, pipeline health and where reps need to focus next.

content.title: Transform reactive firefighting into proactive pipeline growth

items.title: Selling without Aviso Flow
items.description:
• The true pipeline available for next quarter stays hidden
  • Little to zero insight into pipeline and revenue movement
  • No idea of how current and future quarter trends look like
  • Pipeline data is shallow and there is no way to quickly respond to slow pipe

items.title: The Aviso Flow Advantage
items.description:
• Reps know exactly how much pipe they have at start of quarter
  • Displays Historical Pipe Created, Conversion Rates, and Distribution of Total Amount Won by Category
  • Shows both Quarterly Trends (Line Graph) and Distribution of Rates (Box and Whisker Plots)
  • Notifies you when Pipe Generation has slowed in specific Regions or Segments Changes.

content.subtitle: ARMIS
content.title: Aviso is really empathetic to the sales profession. They are constantly pushed to do more and more. Where the AI helps is focusing on consummable insights to draw attention to key business areas.

logo.label: Aviso Flow

content.subtitle: PIPELINE ACCELERATION AND ANALYTICS
content.title: A heart monitor for your pipeline
content.description: Aviso’s Pipeline Acceleration capabilities help sales operations, and sales leadership teams to assess pipeline quality and health, and get advanced insights to help plan and build a new pipeline for future quarters.

items.title: Pipeline Analytics
items.description: Aviso's AI engine pinpoints pipeline flux and highlights possible causes, helping teams to make informed decisions and remedy deal slippage.
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

items.title: Pipeline Health
items.description: AI-based pipeline analytics can help with unbiased inspection versus self-reporting in CRM by comparing start of quarter projections and new pipeline added to EOQ outcomes
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

items.title: Pipeline Planning
items.description: Stay on track to creating sufficient pipeline 1, 2, and 3 quarters out. Understand if your pipeline is the optimal mix of opportunities for success.
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

items.title: Pipeline Building
items.description: Understand if your efforts are building enough momentum for the pipeline in future quarters. Instantly know when pipeline generation has slowed in specific regions or segments.
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

content.subtitle: VISUAL REPORTING
content.title: Insights at a glance. Any way you want
content.description: Aviso’s out-of-box reports enable revenue leaders to visually inspect their revenue cycle, from pipeline, opportunities for customer interactions, and engagement, to forecast and attainment.

items.title: Pipeline Intelligence Reports
items.description: Understand how historical, current, and projected pipelines are progressing. Learn how the pipeline has evolved through the quarter and execute course correction

items.title: Deal & Account Intelligence Reports
items.description: Measure progress with sales linearity, sales funnel, and win-loss analysis. Use churn rate reports and early-churn signals to improve renewal rates.

items.title: Interaction & Engagement Reports
items.description: Aviso uses data from CRM, email, calls and calendar to help you dive deeper into sales activities across deals, teams, specific roles, and account engagement.

items.title: Historical Forecast and Attainment Reports
items.description: View years' worth of sales and customer data on quarterly attainment vs. team productivity at a glance to know if your team is equipped to deliver in forthcoming quarters.

content.subtitle: LICENSE COST TAKEOUT AND AUTOMATION
content.title: More time saved. Less tech spend.
content.description: Aviso reduces the financial burden of licensing by giving non-sales teams full access to the CRM data they need, without paying a penny for it.

items.title: CRM Cost Takeout
items.description: Aviso’s time-series database platform reduces the burden of non-essential CRM licenses (like Sales Managers, Legal, and Procurement) saving you money
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

items.title: CRM Golden Fields
items.description: Aviso identifies CRM fields that are most correlated to past deal closures, and nudges reps to fill only those on priority so reps don’t waste time on unnecessary data entry
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

items.title: Activity and Contact Auto-Population
items.description: Aviso automatically captures contacts, meetings or emails exchanged to be analyzed directly into CRM, reducing the administrative burden of sales reps
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

items.title: Full CRM Replication
items.description: Aviso’s time-series database fully replicates your CRM instance within Aviso (going back 6-8 quarters on average) and delivers precise tracking of state changes in real-time
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

content.title: Aviso works at the frontier of predictive AI to help teams close more deals and drive more revenue.

items.title: - Charles Forsgard
items.subtitle: VP Sales, Honeywell
items.description: Aviso Conversational Intelligence (CI) gives insights right to the seller and at the same time, it gives insights to me (the sales leader) on what I should really be coaching the seller on right now, in their pipeline

items.title: - Brian Gumbel
items.subtitle: CRO at Armis
items.description: Under Trevor's leadership, Aviso will become the global standard for organizations and CROs. Such an incredible and easy to use platform!

items.title: - Lori Harmon
items.subtitle: VP Digital Virtual Sales, NetApp
items.description: I was sold on Aviso and Trevor's vision in my first demo. There is no other platform on the market with such rich functionality. The competition tends to be point solutions that add up to a higher TCO and require separate integrations, eating up the time of your IT team
